image.description: An image URL of the finished dish.

datePublished.description: The date the recipe was published.

prepTime.description: The time it takes to prepare the recipe (ISO 8601 duration).

cookTime.description: The time it takes to cook the recipe (ISO 8601 duration).

totalTime.description: The total time required to prepare and cook the recipe (ISO 8601 duration).

recipeYield.description: The quantity produced by the recipe (for example, '4 servings').

recipeCategory.description: The category of the recipe (for example, 'Dessert').

recipeCuisine.description: The cuisine of the recipe (for example, 'Italian').

recipeIngredient.description: A list of ingredients used in the recipe.

recipeInstructions.description: A list of instructions for making the recipe.

aggregateRating.description: An aggregate rating for the recipe.

calories.description: The number of calories (for example, '250 kcal').

fatContent.description: The amount of fat (for example, '10 g').

carbohydrateContent.description: The amount of carbohydrates (for example, '30 g').

proteinContent.description: The amount of protein (for example, '5 g').

@type.description: The type of item. Must be 'Recipe'.
